channel.title: Runescape coming to consoles
channel.description:
[url=http://www.develop-online.net/news/38525/Jagex-Consoles-blocked-Runescape-cross-play]http://www.develop-online.net/news/38525/Jagex-Consoles-blocked-Runescape-cross-play[/url]
According to that website, rs is coming to consoles, Discuss...

item.title: Runescape coming to consoles
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:62, topic:412598”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=514069.msg3732051#msg3732051 date=1314669911]
JTAG’s Would screw it over somehow and i bet you there going to make you pay for the game and then make you have membership.
[/quote]
Last time I checked there were only a few who could still take their jtag online…

This would be awesome.[/quote]

it would be awesome too, but it should be so you don’t pay membership for it, it should be that its on a seperate data base, and you can xfer gold that you earn in the game to your acc on rs, but the xfers should be limited to about 5 or 6 xfers to your rs acc…

Just to make the xfer interesting, rs should make it so you can’t trade the same ip.

Read full topic

This would be awesome.

item.title: Runescape coming to consoles
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:55, topic:412598”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=514069.msg3732552#msg3732552 date=1314690868]

[quote]It’s funny cause the ps3 got hacked and people lost there credit card numbers.

With the PlayStation3, Every things free![/quote]
They got hacked by anonymous, a team that has hacked government systems. Just wait till they hit the xbox.
[/quote]Nah everyone cool like anonymous plays the xbox.

anonymous is a pro hacking team, they will hack xbox, just wait.

Fucking lol’d[/quote]

Lol’d at you calling Anonymous a hacking team, Anonymous is an idea (a movement if you will), not a group.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape coming to consoles
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:48, topic:412598”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=514069.msg3732185#msg3732185 date=1314672483]

Then Rsps’s will be able to get on Consoles?

ROFL, gl with that.

[quote]It’s funny cause the ps3 got hacked and people lost there credit card numbers.

With the PlayStation3, Every things free![/quote]
They got hacked by anonymous, a team that has hacked government systems. Just wait till they hit the xbox.
[/quote]Nah everyone cool like anonymous plays the xbox.

anonymous is a pro hacking team, they will hack xbox, just wait.

Or maybe you’re an uninformed meme follower who can’t wrap his head around anything but what people say on the internet. Anonymous didn’t hack psn. The faggots who think they are “anonymous” tried to take credit for it. Anonymous lost its value a long time ago.

umadbro?

“umadbro” another internet meme that no one uses anymore. Clearly uninformed[/quote]

What’s with the teaming up on me?

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape coming to consoles
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

lostmyphat:

[quote]Or maybe you’re an uninformed meme follower who can’t wrap his head around anything but what people say on the internet. Anonymous didn’t hack psn. The faggots who think they are “anonymous” tried to take credit for it. Anonymous lost its value a long time ago.

Here what Hacker Anonymous Posted on his Facebook wall Today.

“Take a break from online gaming for a while……it will help your skills, your health, and your emotional levels, which by the way are a bit out of order if they are being shackled by the PSN being down,” it says. “We have no qualms about our actions, even though it may affect fellow anonymous or supporters… we hope they understand the bigger picture.”[/quote]

Why doesnt the FBI search Facebook anymore! That’s what it is there for!

Read full topic

“Take a break from online gaming for a while……it will help your skills, your health, and your emotional levels, which by the way are a bit out of order if they are being shackled by the PSN being down,” it says. “We have no qualms about our actions, even though it may affect fellow anonymous or supporters… we hope they understand the bigger picture.”
